item.description:
Well hello there everyone, I hope the gorgeous weather this weekend has lifted your spirit and energy to spring time heights.

I just wanted to let you know that this Thursday before our usual incubating session, John aka the one and only Giovanni will be performing at Improv Boston for his graduation performance at 6:30.

So go check it out before the incubator and fill up the crowd for him and his crew.

Be there and Giovanni might share his secrets with you!

Rock on!

Jason J.
item.how_to_find_us: In the audience with the rest of you showing support!
item.name: Giovanni to the stage!!
